capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and I'm quite certain about it. I mean, he's always referred to as 'he' or 'him' in the books and movies. It's not like J.K. Rowling would have made such a big deal about his gender if she was going to make him something else.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria, you mentioned that hagrid is a male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid, he's a great guy. I mean, being half-giant and all, it can't be easy for him. But he's always been very kind to me, especially when we were at Hogwarts together. He was like a mentor to me, you know? And his love for magical creatures is just amazing. I've learned so much from him about the importance of treating all living beings with respect and care.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria, you mentioned that hagrid is a male.
